question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.


You have a full-time job and you are also doing a part-time evening course.


You now find that you cannot continue the course.


Write a letter to your teachers. In your letter


describe the situation


explain why you cannot continue at this time


say what action you would like to take


You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am a student who is registered in your course for this semester and I am writing this letter to inform you that I might not be able to continue the course due to a change that has been made in my job.

Please let me provide brief personal information; I work as a project manager in a technology company. On the one hand, I took your course because my job involves some coding knowledge. On the other hand, I am always interested in learning new skills and I thought it would be useful in life.

Unfortunately, it was all right until recently I was assigned by the corporation to move to a different branch in another city. Therefore, although I am keen to learn in your evening course, it is not possible to make it happen now.
Now, I am wondering if it would be possible for me to rejoin a cohort course next July when I come back. it would be greatly appreciated if you could let me know as soon as possible
